dt: {bc}to make involuntary stops and repetitions in speaking {bc}{sx|stutter||}
{bc}to utter with involuntary stops or repetitions

et: Middle English {it}stameren{/it}, from Old English {it}stamerian{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}stamalōn{/it} to stammer, Old Norse {it}stemma{/it} to hinder, damn up {ma}{mat|stem|}{/ma}
shortdef: to make involuntary stops and repetitions in speaking : stutter
